corrupted_lord.name: Corrupted Lord
corrupted_lord.description: A favored champion of the dark gods, leading their warband into war.

corrupted_lord_steed.name: Corrupted Lord on Cursed Steed
corrupted_lord_steed.description: A favored champion of the dark gods, leading their warband into war ontop of a demonic beast.

corrupted_lord_on_lizard.name: Corrupted Lord on Lizard Beast
corrupted_lord_on_lizard.description: A favored champion of the dark gods, leading their warband into war ontop of a massive lizard beast.

corrupted_lord_manticore.name: Corrupted Lord on Manticore
corrupted_lord_manticore.description: A favored champion of the dark gods, leading their warband into war ontop of a deadly manticore.

pestilence_master.name: Pestilent Master
pestilence_master.description: A revulsive overlord of one of the cults of pestilence, riding a personally-fleshcrafted abomination.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: A corrupted spellcaster, bending reality to their twisted visions.

sorcerer_horse.name: Sorcerer on Cursed Steed
sorcerer_horse.description: A corrupted spellcaster riding a demonic beast, bending reality to their twisted visions.

sorcerer_manticore.name: Sorcerer on Manticore
sorcerer_manticore.description: A corrupted spellcaster riding ontop of a deadly manticore, bending reality to their twisted visions.

corrupted_warriors.name: Corrupted Warriors
corrupted_warriors.description: A regiment of corrupted warriors who march into battle to gain the favours of their dark gods.

corrupted_mutants.name: Corrupted Mutants
corrupted_mutants.description: A pack of corrupted warriors who have gone insane in their twisted bodies.

corrupted_barbarians.name: Corrupted Barbarians
corrupted_barbarians.description: Frenzied Warriors who rush into battle to appease their dark gods.

barbarian_outriders.name: Barbarian Outriders
barbarian_outriders.description: Barbarians who ride atop crazed beasts into battle, trampling their foes under their hooves and steel.

corrupted_knights.name: Corrupted Knights
corrupted_knights.description: Dark Knights who serve the Corrupted Gods.

chosen_knights.name: Chosen Knights
chosen_knights.description: Personal Bodyguards of the great Corrupted Lords, ready to bring carnage to the battlefield.

chosen.name: Corrupted Chosen
chosen.description: Blessed by their dark gods, these warriors set out to slay the mightiest heroes.

demonic_spawn.name: Demonic Spawn
demonic_spawn.description: Horribly mutated beings that run rampant on the battlefield.

excess_outriders.name: Excess Outriders
excess_outriders.description: The cultists of excess ride demonic mounts that have been blessed with unnatural swiftness.

exalted_sorcerer_disk.name: Exalted Sorcerer on Arcane Disk
exalted_sorcerer_disk.description: A spellcaster on top of a floating disk, who has mastered the reality-shifting magic of the old gods.

pestilence_warriors.name: Foetid Lords
pestilence_warriors.description: A regiment of corrupted warriors who have been blessed by the god of pestilence.

corrupted_berzerkers.name: Corrupted Berzerkers
corrupted_berzerkers.description: A regiment of mindless brutes blessed with eternal bloodlust, killing for their god of wrath.

excess_warriors.name: Excess Warriors
excess_warriors.description: A regiment of sadistic warriors who march into battle in gleaming armour.

enchanted_knights.name: Enchanted Knights
enchanted_knights.description: Knights who have acquired forbidden knowledge and transmutated their steeds into arcane disks.

corrupted_tactics.name: Corrupted Tactics
corrupted_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

artifact.name: Cursed Artifact
artifact.description: Once per turn, for every model with this rule, add +1 to a cast roll of a friendly Power model within 6“ of this unit.

companion.name: Arcane Companion
companion.description: Once per turn when a power within 24“ of this model gets dispelled, deal 1 hit with AP(2) to the caster.

disk_of_magic.name: Disk of Magic
disk_of_magic.description: This model increases its Movement by 2". This unit may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

chaotic_standard.name: Chaotic Standard
chaotic_standard.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" may gain +1 AP on all Melee or all Shooting weapons.

accursed_banner.name: Accursed Banner
accursed_banner.description: Friendly units within 6" get +1 Courage and enemy units within 6" get -1 Courage.

mutations.name: Mutations
mutations.description:
Mutations: At the beginning of the game choose one of the following effects to be applied to this unit:
* Strength rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP
* Strength rolls of 1 or 2 cause 2 hits instead of 1.
* +1 Save

strategies.name: Eye of the Gods
strategies.description: Use when a friendly unit destroys an enemy unit. That unit gains +1 Strength until the end of the battle. A unit may only be affected by this strategy once.
strategies.flavor: The forces of chaos commit countless bloodbaths to appease their dark gods, in hope of gaining boons and turning into a demon lord.

strategies.name: Fearless
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
strategies.flavor: Unflinged by the horrors of war, the forces of chaos march ever forward.

strategies.name: Blazing Runes
strategies.description: Use before an Infantry unit fights. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
strategies.flavor: Corrupted Warriors wield enchanted weapons, covered in unholy runes and burning with dark magic.

arcane_bolt.name: Arcane Bolt
arcane_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(4). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 3 hits with AP(3). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

arcane_barrage.name: Arcane Barrage
arcane_barrage.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 5 hits with AP(1). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

balefire.name: Balefire
balefire.description: Target enemy unit within 24" take 3 hits with AP(1).

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Save test.

sap_strength.name: Sap Strength
sap_strength.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -1 Strength until the end of the turn.

deadly_miasma.name: Deadly Miasma
deadly_miasma.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 6 hits with AP(2).

unholy_vitality.name: Unholy Vitality
unholy_vitality.description: Target friendly unit within 12" heals 1 lost wound.

spreading_plague.name: Spreading Plague
spreading_plague.description: Roll a d10 for every enemy unit within 12". On a 3 or less that unit takes 4 hits with AP(1).
